app_description: EduFlow helps students navigate complex topics like Machine Learning, Web Development, and Data Structures & Algorithms by suggesting custom course flows. It curates YouTube playlists, articles, and GitHub projects, allowing you to track your progress with local storage. Choose a topic below to start your personalized learning journey!
select_topic_to_begin: Select a topic from the dropdown above to begin your personalized learning journey.
no_items_match_filters: No items match the selected filters.
ai_generator_description: Tell me your career goal and current level, and I'll suggest a personalized learning path.
alert_select_goal_level: Please select both a goal and a level.
roadmap_description: Generate a personalized learning roadmap for your selected topic.
no_items_planned: No items planned for this day.
alert_select_topic_duration: Please select a topic and a duration.
